articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: GitHub, Microsoft embrace Anthropic’s spec for connecting AI models to data sources - TechCrunch
articles.description: GitHub and Microsoft, GitHub's corporate parent, are joining the steering committee for MCP, Anthropic’s standard for connecting AI models to the systems where data resides.
articles.content:
GitHub and Microsoft, GitHub’s corporate parent, are joining the steering committee for MCP, Anthropics standard for connecting AI models to the systems where data resides.
